title: Taking photos using assistant
content:
I tried to test my Google assistant's ability to take photos tonight, and the only thing it will do is open the camera app. 

Won work with a request to take a photo in x seconds, won't take a selfie, nothing. I made sure assistant had access to the camera and device storage, but it didn't help. 

Any ideas outside of the standard "try a factory reset"?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
